pull.title: qt, refactor: Optimize signal-slot connections logic
pull.body:
This PR:
- is a follow up and based on #17937 (update: already merged)
- implements an idea from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17937#issuecomment-575991765
- simplifies `WalletFrame` class interface
- as a side effect, removes `bitcoingui` -> `walletframe` -> `bitcoingui` circular dependency
- is an alternative to #17500

issue.title: refactor, qt: Nuke walletframe circular dependency
issue.body:
This PR:
- gets rid of `qt/bitcoingui` -> `qt/walletframe` -> `qt/bitcoingui` circular dependency
- ~is based on top of #17499 (as a prerequisite)~ (merged)

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18865 (gui: Refactor WalletFrame to extend QStackView by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Rebased after #17937 and #18036 have been merged.

issue.title: gui: Drop WalletModel dependency to RecentRequestsTableModel
issue.body: This PR moves the `RecentRequestsTableModel` instancing to where it's needed which in turn breaks the circular dependency between `WalletModel` and `RecentRequestsTableModel`.

issue.title: qt: Add privacy to the Overview page
issue.body:
This PR allows to hide/reveal values on the Overviewpage by checking/unchecking Menu->Settings-> Mask Values

Closes #16407 

Privacy mode is OFF (the default behavior):
![Screenshot from 2020-01-02 15-08-28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/71669074-28ab6980-2d74-11ea-8e54-4973aa307192.png)

Privacy mode is ON:
![Screenshot from 2020-01-02 15-10-23 cropped](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/71669082-2d701d80-2d74-11ea-9df5-d4acc4982dbe.png)

issue.title: wip: gui: Refactor to drop client and wallet models setters
issue.body:
This change makes the code simpler as the client and wallet models are set in the constructor and are constant.

Based on #18064, only bbb33d6.

This does't change behavior.

issue.title: gui: Fix segfault for loading and immediately unloading wallet
issue.body:
These changes block a wallet unload until the GUI completes the process of its model loading.

Fix #18362

issue.title: gui: Drop RecentRequestsTableModel dependency to WalletModel
gui: Refactor WalletFrame to extend QStackView
issue.body:
Some code added in #2220 no longer applies as the list of wallets is actually a combo in the toolbar.

Considering #16883, it's very unlikely the current GUI will change and follow the idea of #2220.

issue.title: qt: Handle exceptions instead of crash
issue.body:
Related issue #18643.

With this PR the GUI handles the wallet-related exception, displays it to a user:

![Screenshot from 2020-05-06 18-16-51](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/81194870-d306f800-8fc5-11ea-860a-b9510bb3bd2b.png)

and, if the exception is a non-fatal error, leaves the main window running.

events.body: Rebased 809fd3a6e4952671633a5c193fb5fa0f41837b29 -> 7d7cd84351b6c1637ec40f7546c1aaa16bb55199 ([pr17966.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr17966.04) -> [pr17966.05](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr17966.05)) due to the conflict with #16432.
There's a Concept ACK, however no subsequent review after ~6 months and this is purely a gui/qt refactor. I'm going to suggest moving this over to https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui.
